Class LeaseList

java.lang.Object
  LeaseList

public class LeaseList
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to represent a list of car leases.

Author:
manuel

          Creates an empty lease list.

leaseCount

public int leaseCount()
Returns the number of leases in the list.

Returns:
the number of leases

openLeaseCount

public int openLeaseCount()
Returns the number of leases that are open in the list. An open lease indicates a car that is currently rented to a customer.

Returns:
the number of open leases.

closedLeaseCount

public int closedLeaseCount()
Returns the number of leases that are closed in the list. A close lease indicates a car that has been returned by the customer.

Returns:
the number of close leases.

printAllLeases

public void printAllLeases()
Prints all leases in the list.

printAllLeases

public void printAllLeases(int customerId)
Prints all leases for a given customer.

Parameters:
theCustomer -

findLease

public Lease findLease(int customerId,
                       java.lang.String registration)
Finds a lease for a given customers and registration number.

Parameters:
customerId - the customer id
registration - the registration number
Returns:
the lease for the combination of input parameters, or false otherwise.

leaseCount

public int leaseCount(int customerId)
Returns the number of leases for a given customer.

Parameters:
customerId - the id of the customer.
Returns:
the number of lease for the customer.
